wPRmmUv-xilLjo-0LHebeQ.text: Best sports book in vegas, i had the best service at the bar, enjoying some football . I am a local and i love beer, very good food too, impressed about their beer selection, the manager suggested the manly with a fried egg on top, its a life changing experience, the onions the meat, the bread and their diabla sauce are great!!! Coming back for sure .

_jEDkI6kun2Cf7BLCYoUeg.text: Servers was friendly, We try SunnySide Burger & Umami Burger and Truffle Fries plus Salad, Amazing taste except meat quality

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. We&#39;re first time to try Umami Burger

5v76Bwccp-cV8vdkWizbmw.text: Super Bowl Sunday, not an open seat anywhere in town and if you missed out on this place, you had better put it on your list next year. Paid seating, no crazy crowds or people 4 deep at the bar. Bar seats, beer garden or lounge areas all spacious and perfect to watch the game, eat and drink! We had bar seats, 2 of only 10 and nothing but the game, bartenders and food in front and behind us. Bartenders and servers were great, food was better then pub food and geared more towards those with better tastes! Do miss this spot for any big game you want to watch.....

XT8w0N6NhmeQX1kcYhrqmA.text: Came specifically here for umami burger. Place was closed on a Tuesday due to revised hours. Took a lyft from the other end of the strip just to eat here so this was a disappointment.

VbKFoo8m--f-ClwoiqiToQ.text: This place was the best thing at the SLS hotel . Not sure why it doesn't have higher ratings . We went there 2 times I was obsessed with it. Both times I got the sunny side burger which was amazing. The truffle fries are an absolute must have. They also have great hot sauce and aioli sauce. Would definitely go back for this

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

D7k8bQZ5jxo5pSjlh55zvQ.text: First time here and not the greatest first impression. From the beginning (hostess) to the end I expected better, especially being a local and knowing how service on the strip should be, even for a new hotel. My friend and I were not greeted by the hostess right away. Waited about 10mins until someone took our order. The runner and bussers came to us and took our order before we even saw our server. Servers need to be more attentive whether it is their table or not. Mandy was awesome and very helpful though!  Food was okay, sweet potato fries felt like a bowl of cinnamon toast crunch,not my thing.   Overall it would not be my first choice of dining if I were to come to SLS again.

5Ot9evMof74W-jVgo7ppFA.text: Ordered a burger and fried pickles and decided to go down and pick it up instead of having it delivered to the room. 1) it was ready almost 30 minutes after I was told it would be ready. 2) they did not include the ranch dip with the pickles. When I called they said they would bring the sauce right up, but they never showed.  (surprise)    The burger was ok, but a little dry. Not worth the hype. I would review the pickles but they got too cold to eat while I was waiting for the dip.

B_lfJ6D56b1MTeE00R_KRA.text: Come back ton this place year after year.. Great patio and great service (Mandy) and one of few places I can come watch games, gamble, patio bar, and bring my two kiddos when they want to come !!! Love it

q2gcGzDcjVt_aTMObj5Qng.text: This place sucks! The burgers suck. The fries suck. The cheese tots suck. Rather go to In-N-Out. At least the service was good.

HSHLMvfBSZhPldqRm0Z0fg.text: We went to umami burger for the first time and ordered their hatch and umami burgers and a side of truffle fries that were free with checkin thru yelp very cool.  The beef was high quality and was cooked to order I thought the tomato sauce on the umami burger was different but tasty.  The cheese and chilies on the hatch were good but didn't pack a flavor punch

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hatch chili burger

bGjT_ZxYI0SzbRpfCtnZtw.text: My boyfriend and I were visiting Vegas for the first time and we stayed at the SLS. We had a long night and let's just say I had a little too much to drink . I don't drink often but we're in Vegas so why not ! Well I woke up feeling like my life was ending . After walking around we decided to just eat at Umani Burger. Our server TASHJA was beyond amazing !!!! Her service was above and beyond ! She went out of her way to make sure that all was well with me . She suggested food that she knew would make me better and listen to this ... she went to the opposite side of the hotel just to get me soup !!! If that's not amazing service i don't know what is . If you're reading this and you're visiting Vegas or if you live here please go see TASHJA at Umani Burger . She's the sweetest person I've ever met . They are blessed to have her on staff !  I want to say thank you so much and I can't wait to visit her again . She rocks !

IPk7ZwGHwcQlPbqw7LiPYA.text: The best burger joint in town. I hate to even try and classify it as a burger joint because each masterfully crafted burger is a work of art. This is the pinocle of deliciousness in the burger world. Each burger is a work of culinary genius with an explosion of excellently blended ingredients leaving your taste buds begging for more.

vqoUCiDj4HiUZpDx4xpSEQ.text: Started with the pumpking ale which was good, did the beer with some truffle fries and watched the blue jays get slammed by kc  .. Then my awesome waitress liz recommended the manly burger and the new ice cream sandwiches they have, is like an ice cream burger.. Everything was great.. This is my go to place on my cheat days

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ice cream and nutella burger !!
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Manly!!

ieKoBR9CTLB2MolJyuvFdg.text: Either I was really hungry or this was one good burger!  I had the Manly burger which is a bacon cheeseburger with onion strings...seems basic but it was real tasty and juicy!  Also had a side of the Korean sweet potato fries that was covered with kimchi, goat cheese, scallions and korean ketchup...mmmmm!  A definite must try if you have the chance.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Must&#39;ve been good!
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Manly burger
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Korean sweet potato fries

iHRCxWbsUnjLJmOJ8cwAVg.text: Karina is a very nice person who took our reservations. She did not know the weather outside, but she said her boss doesn't like it if she moves from her one foot by one foot square. No, that is not True at all! She was very helpful and I guess I should mention the food. It was unique, in a very good way! The last time I ate there, about a week ago, it was filled with lots of TV's showing games, and one on some sort of Chinese station. I have no idea why. But trust me, you're going to love it, heck, you're going to like it for sure, well, it is OK, if you are into that sort of thing. :) Honestly it is better than any Applebee's, Friday's, and just about the same price. You also don't get to hear any clapping servers singing happy happy birthday, may all your dreams come True.... And ask for Karina, and let her know Paul said hi!

yZQGjIpt80Xdz7omIzw5qw.text: The most delicious burger I have ever tasted , cooked to perfection , juicy as a real medium well should be , fresh  baked buns and perfect portion. We can not stop talking about this place . It can be a little pricy . I would recommend a visit to add to your list while in Vegas

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

aotgE-wWw8BwosoFOOT7KA.text: Amazing service and food. Best burger I have had. Ahi tuna burger was on point and the ginger carrots explode in ur mouth! Highly recommend.

vQG6ddXoT17emph32eA-4w.text: 30-45 minute wait, food didn't live up to the hype. The nice thing about it is that it has sports book

TFwhCK3nmxlLdfWzCY8ClA.text: A friend and I decided to give Umami at the SLS Casino a try and we were not disappointed. They had great burgers, a nice list of alcoholic drinks and some awesome truffle fries. Our server Courtney was pretty awesome herself. She was very attentive and gave us the scoop about RSVPing if we wanted to get a booth for Sunday's NFL football game to insure we got a booth for it; which each booth has its own personal tv. All in all I have to say we really enjoyed the whole experience. Ate twice in a row there so that has to say something about the place and the staff!

bYnOk9aUr-zb7PIofPH2cQ.text: This place is amazing.  Our waitress Casey was a blast.  The beer garden is fun. You can play ping pong and foosball while waiting.  Truffle burger is to die for.  They do need to fix the air hockey table though.  There are lots of burger places in Vegas.  The truffle burger here and the bacon burger at I love burgers are my two faves.

2fyX9vreGeTGerkQUoL7XQ.text: Great food and drinks. Great place to catch the game. Our bartender Safa was very attentive and recommended great beers and food from the menu. Would definitely recommend for a relaxed Sunday night!

30JqFPf3S9VIEOH7y_8gpw.text: Great burger really kind staff need a few other items on menu maybe and a better desert but over all awesome burger. Perfect burger really

xtd31mdOYKp8emz7MCT3BA.text: This place was amazing! I'm not a huge burger fan but I was going crazy over the Manly Burger. The bacon lardons make the burger. We also got the pickled veggies which were delicious, I loved the snap peas and carrots! Our server, Josh, was very friendly and knowledgable about the food and drink menus both. I highly recommend this place!!!

7_yYyW3MmrNpit6lTFi6Gg.text: The nachos and sweet potato fries were excellent.  The fires had a slight sweet cinnamon taste.  The beef on the crispy nachos was killer, but the cheese was a little processed tasting.  They're not huge portions, but enough for the two of us for a light dinner.  Eating in the outside patio at sunset was nice.

5IxRk8Fb-mcBbukFtkUGlw.text: Amazing service. Really. I've never heard of this burger chain, but hadn't eaten in 12 hours and 12 states. I just wanted a burger. The menu was a befuddlement of strange ways to make a burger. I picked a Cali burger but without the house sauce (careful due to egg allergy). It tasted weird, really...weird. The tomato was a glop (fire roasted apparently) and the onions were more like egg noodles - wet cooked strings.  I scraped it off and tried again but it still tasted weird. Megan, my attentive waitress, asked if everything was good. I expressed my opinion. Although I didn't like it I didn't blame the restaurant. Sometimes things just aren't to your taste. However my  surprise and delight the manager immediately swooped in, organized for me as close to a "regular" burger as they were able to construct - which was basically burger, bun, lettuce, raw onions. The manager also brought over a selection of sauces on the side. She asked if I like mustard. I said don't even go there I only like colemans. 3 minutes later she showed up with a side dish of English mustard! The new burger was much more to my liking.  So there you go - it's not my kind of restaurant - but that's no-ones fault. This place went above and beyond to make it as right as they possibly could. Epically amazing service.

z_gxyVhc2ZaykdFfJ0NryA.text: Liz was a great server/bartender at the beer garden at the back patio of the beer garden.  She was very conversational and engaging in a busy environment.  If you're in Vegas and you come to the SLS, ask for her because she will definitely hook you up.

DriZUNU5hWZ3sMdKOSVq-A.text: Visited with my daughter and boyfriend and the service was excellent.  Burgers were great too!  Love how the sweet buns are stamped with a "U".  Love the truffle fries!!!

ja_fWxueI7LheQvErgVncQ.text: Dined here with my boyfriend one night and I had the truffle burger. It was not the greatest thing ever. I had been hearing about this place by friends and when I actually went to eat here I was quite disappointed. Maybe I just chose the wrong burger, but I didn't like it. It didn't live up to the hype everyone was making over this place.

Sfxip3ZEn5S8Oe_AFm-z_A.text: Our meals were great! Had the manly and ahi tuna burgers - both were flavorful and fresh. Our server Sonny, was very friendly and prompt, also had spot on recommendations.

VnfkqbUcgDuQ0R_XthWjFw.text: I live in Los Angeles and whenever I come to vegas I always make sure I make a stop here. The last few times were lucky enough to get our favorite waiter Sunny. He is always so personable and funny and always makes our time enjoyable.

HFLaZS6ETWSOcji3ZVONTQ.text: Ordered the Manly burger. The blend of sauces and cheese gives it an amazing taste.  The complimentary truffle fries with the Yelp check-in are a must have.  Will be back again.

OTsVWCFz1Rb78QuGwgwv_w.text: Best lunch i had in a long time, great atmosphere, chill, well designed. Great service. very well prIced. AMAZING onion rings! Great tuna tartar, great salads, good burger. Amazing service from a very lovely Asian? girl, who was very prompt and patient with me.

-KhdlomszC9dtZh8Jmfnqg.text: We had an awesome corporate dinner at Umami! We didn't have any issues making the reservation on the same day. Mandy was the best, taking great care of the whole party. Burgers, appetizers and drinks were delish! I personally recommend the Hatch burger and the Buffalo wings. The ambiance was great too. We'll definitely return on our next business trip to Las Vegas!

gs-Ni8Aj220SLPdv9h7CRg.text: I recently had dinner at Umami burger in the SLS and had nothing less than a first class experience. Our server Ashley was attentive to our requests and very friendly. Umami's beer garden has great outdoor seating and to compliment that an extensive beer menu to compliment their many appetizers and entrees. I had the Ahi Poke for an appetizer with the in house made chips paired with a burger that Ashely selected. Umami Burger and Beer Garden is a first rate joint and I would strongly recommend friends and family to visit! Thank you Umami Burger staff and management for a great dining experience!

SgzMsCwrzO5ZFQL7qDEzNw.text: The truffle burger was amazing! My husband loved his throwback burger, we split an order of onion rings and they were super fresh!!

uyD6aqDmp8K3FTMcHunMCg.text: I rarely order my burgers medium rare, but the meat is so fresh I did. The "manly burger" was so delicious! Definitely gourmet! It had caramelized onions and bacon! The tempura battered onion rings and sweet potato fries were really good too! They make all the dips in house. Even the ketchup! Our server, Courtney was incredible! She was fun and easy on the eyes! Also, she recommended the caramel ice cream sandwich! Soooo good. Imagine a snicker doodle caramel ice cream sandwich. Good atmosphere. Outdoor seating is cool too. I'll be back.

v6mlTFuBMTpxFjSZ0mnAyw.text: As always, Umami was great!  Mandy was very informative, and fun!  I always recommend The Manly Burger!! Mmmm-Mmmm!!

hiLdYRB0nWYaO7FmrpaaXA.text: Of quality/flavorful food, great service, ambiance on point and fantastic sports screen!

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. HIGHLY RECOMMENED!!!* Umami cesar salad, Truffle Fries, Manly Burger

uc7Qp5OCfaY68ZkJ-DYw2A.text: Great place to hang watch some sports/tv and veg on a comfy couch!! Absolutely love this place :) Tashja waited on us and she was Awe-Mazing!!!

N1jBDvPsmbTBDQ_Lig59Hg.text: Food = great. Service  = subpar. If it wasn't for the food being really good I would have rated it a 2 star.

IgReGFEbPApr4urxZTlBHA.text: Pretty good burger but the size is very small. Service is good. We ordered French fries and the waitress brought up different kinds of sauces along.

7zXxwm5-NbfvpUgGtbtyig.text: Everything is fantastic! My husband and I both got burgers. I got the Manly and hubby got the Sunnyside, both were amazing! We got a side of sweet potato fries. Tasted great alone but even better with the sauces they provide. The drinks were good, the only thing is they were out of the cider along with the pool bar at SLS. I got a strawberry daiquiri instead. Very good! We got a free ice cream sandwich with our stay at SLS. Also amazing! The cookie is soft and salted caramel ice cream is devine! I would definitely come back!

J96st3W3sD-xdZBmu17zNg.text: I've heard good things about this place so I tried it with my girlfriend. Service was great but I personally did not enjoy the burger. I had a Umami burger I believe and truffle fries. I don't recommend those specific items.

0Tl0wxOHmcs-JyuBADxWBg.text: The food was amazing but service did not exist! I think this is the saddest looking group of people I have ever seen working in a restaurant. We asked twice for a waiter after we were seated. Had to ask for silver, then napkins after the food was served and of course had to wait on them. Asked for the drink menu to order second round and the waiter never came back to take the order. We finally just asked for the bill. If you don't mind casual, I don't care if you're served attitude then try the truffle burger and Manly fries.  We wanted to sit outside but they said there was a private party so check before you go if you are wanting to eat on the patio.

Ly8IuONfshdlHWeRKc9j0w.text: More generous side order portions but such crappy service. Had to flag down workers for water, ask twice for sauces, forgetting drinks. Retrain your workers, maybe ask the people at the grove umami how to run a burger place. Good luck surviving.

oHf-AhHUJgqLP2s9NVMY1g.text: Not a bier garden, per our server .  A restaurant that serves beer.  Burgers are very good, service not so much.  If you are looking for a quick bite  and not in a hurry, this might be the place to go.

_xZHpZ_VLDgMmBoiMqr7_A.text: Came in for an early dinner and watch some of the Stanley Cup final. We were seated quickly and had a great view of the giant screen. Casey took excellent care of us! Super attentive and super helpful when it came to choosing drinks and food! Five stars for Casey!

WlpLD8e6klV894RpYO2qqA.text: We stumbled upon this when we were headed for the pizza place inside the SLS. The pizza place was closed & we didn't have time to go elsewhere. We're so glad we did!   The burgers were AMAZING! My husband is a burger snob & thinks most burgers aren't that great. He said this was one of the best he's ever had, kids said the same. I had an awesome salad. The service was fantastic, friendly & fast, which we appreciated since we had a flight to catch. The manager stopped by for a bit & chatted, offered a few suggestions of other places to try.  Bottled beer selection is pretty decent, the tap beer selection not very interesting - given the absolutely massive selection of good craft beers around, they could get a few more interesting beers on tap.

oCYIg7fTlGEu8BpEfOhoxQ.text: I'm from LA I've had Umami back home...ordered the Manly burger and it was by far way better than the Studio city location and that place is pretty good...the difference was the bacon..way thicker and smoked to perfectiont and the service was on point thanx to Sonny!

os5vnbbBk7T3pqPHn1wukQ.text: I love a good burger and always looking for a simple yet quality burger and the Umami is all of that and more. But, regardless of how good the burger is...customer service is key and their staff is awesome and very inviting and our server was great. Will def be back

N8rGFW_sGcbHDCXzaKdvJA.text: Casey was amazing.   We insisted on sitting on the patio before it opened.  She came back from break early to serve us.

tSmErz4PUB3GmP8MAQ9kJg.text: Just had a late lunch here after returning from the NASCAR races and wow were we impressed! Best burgers, fries, beer and service! Sunny was our waiter and gave us excellent recommendations! We had the Manly burger ,the Greenbird burger and truffle cheese fries! All were stellar!!! We were so sad it was over when we finished. And have already decided to go back later in the evening to have it again. Lol! Sunny also recommended an AMAZING beer that wasn't on the menu. It was Samuel Smith's organic chocolate stout beer! Let me just say it's the best I have ever had! Highly recommend this place!!!

9tmS3NC2nujXJtjoEuEBgg.text: Typical Las Vegas burger place. Never been to any of the other locations. Onion rings were on point, buger was decent.  Probably will skip over it in the future unless I stay at SLS.

0WT0X2OJZ4VwZni-MZYgHg.text: Been to several Umamis and this experience was great, Mandy our host was an absolute doll, she was very informative great experience overall ..!!!

pPAyncro2s4bQj3lFSe1zw.text: I've been here twice and had TERRIBLE service both times. The hosts sit you down and hand you a menu quickly, but it takes the waiters/waitresses 30+ minutes to even acknowledge you. What puzzles me is this place has tons of staff walking around, but no one to help you. Both times I've been here I've had to get the attention of a manager and complain about waiting and not being helped. Food is ok, but I recommend just driving a few more miles to get better food and service at Bachi Burger.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Especiale Truffle&#39;d Burger and Parmesan Truffle Fries

gB-A37_kCvymVIb7ZQNwoA.text: Awsome food!!! Really liked the truffleburger, it was amazing. We also had the korean fries with goat cheese, and there was so much flavor!

h_n5JP28sI3u7ye8og7JvQ.text: We just visited Las Vegas and tried Umami for the first time.  Our server, Josh, was really great, explained the "umami" concept to us and gave us plenty of time to choose the right beer and Umami burgers, which were DELICIOUS, We went back again, this time trying barbecue wings and a Seared Ahi salad. Again, way better than expected in a beer garden.  We asked for Josh this time, and again got excellent service. We'll definitely recommend this place and be back again.

9_fC7RRH6a2hppLWEQSZyA.text: 5 stars goes to Liz at the bar! We are locals and come to SLS every so often. Liz is very welcoming, attentive and just a happy gal to be served by :)

Z1dIcusgWGR-6jZ8Y1UeAQ.text: Yum yum!  Ok, so I'm from California and I heard about this place and never went. When I made my trek to vegas at the sls hotel I was extremely famished. In a hurry, I looked up something nearby. This place was awesome!  I had the original burger medium well with the free order of truffle fries. The 3 sauces were great with the burger. My friend had the cali with the Korean sweet potato fries. The burger was juicy and mouthwatering even though it was medium well. I'll definitely be having it medium next time I visit. The truffle fries are to die for but the Korean sweet potato fries were lacking compared to everything else.  If you are a local nevadian you get 50% off Sunday. I recommend this place for a filling meal that won't break your wallet.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside bar
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside

QlCLdPicmSU45PSaDHPJ5Q.text: Located in the remodeled SLS, we walked past the hostess to check out the tiny sports book first.  We then went into the restaurant to find a seat.  I guess when you ignore the hostess, the waitresses forget to serve you, so we had to flag them down ourselves.    Our meal was pretty decent, although we didn't order too much because we weren't hungry.  Not entirely your average sports bar food.  Some more adventuresome dishes.  Plenty of big screens, but surprised the crowd was pretty lame for a playoff game.  Maybe a bigger sport book with more gamblers would have juiced up the crowd.

ib24V6p6Gbm-2y0PScWaLA.text: Thanks for the free beer but way overrated...truffle fries were clued up chicken wings were mass produced and way over breaded and the blue cheese was literally water with some crumbs.  Burger was ok. Nice shape with a weird U brand on the bun.   The bartender was a little standoffish and as expected snobby....  Very disappointed considering the other reviews....

GqKcBokvZIFHHR4nlc7MKA.text: Great bar with tons of beer selection and food! Worth the walk down Fremont! They have good specials and a wide variety of drinks.  They've got Left Hand's Nitro Milkstout on tap, but I decided to go for the Deschutes Fresh Squeezed IPA. Awesome service as well! Come here!

XXj_AFbcA57KFISuthUT6g.text: Husband and I came in for a quick lunch - and was very impressed by their delicious burgers! Their truffle fries were on point too. Our server, Tashja was very friendly and hospitable. We definitely will be back the next time we're in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Hatch burger and truffle fries.. Delicious combo!!

oRDBtdk7C7aNdg39VdtBmw.text: There is no other way to describe this place other than  DELICIOUS.   Everything was juicy flavorful and delish.

GAI5K4GTx8uUrcNsDWHIkA.text: My girlfriend and I love this place. The quality of the burgers are great and the price is even better. We've tried most burger places on the strip and this place is by far one of the best. I always get the manly burger and truffle fries. The maple bacon fries are really tasty too.   Only thing we dislike is the booth with the pokey hair.

PCbacDU60MFlHWss18MHcg.text: The food would be 3 stars but the service made it 4 stars.   Our cute waitress Tashja made the meal.  Super friendly and personable, but best of all she knew the menu and made great suggestions.    The North Boulevard drink was Yummmm...pretty dangerous because you couldn't taste the alcohol but could tell more than one would get you pretty messed up.  Like happy lemonade.  Fried Pickles were great, super crunchy.    I had the Ahi Tuna burger...yes, I went to a burger joint for tuna.  It was very good.    Hubby had Turkey burger which he thought tasted a little weird.  Just eh.  Sandwiches are definitely not very big as others have said.

SXC5uBN6yNEWYQcH36bSBw.text: Sadly I revisited this restaurant because I loved it the first time. This time It was horrible and I'll never waste my time and money again. I only frequent Vegas for work purposes so I usually order Togo and take it back to my room. This last time it was nearly impossible to get anyone to help me. When I finally was able to get the attention of the bartenders I didn't even ask for a menu ,just gave my order and I was ready to pay. She put in the order and I waited 35 minutes before she even remembered I was there. Someone finally saw that my Togo bag had been placed on the counter and the ticket showed it had been ready for the last twenty minutes. She mentioned nothing of it, processed my payment and gave me the bag. I get to my room and the burger was ice cold. Had it not been for the fact that I had to be at the airport at 4am I would've brought it back. I simply tossed the cold turkey burger in the trash and considered my money wasted. Word to the wise, unless you're coming to sit and truly enjoy a hot burger at a table... Togo is not where they strive.

jamcABoTmXNPvwWauZQ3tQ.text: For starters I will say our service was great. Our server was very attentive ( even though she had too many tables to juggle).   The food and restaurant in the other hand was not a good experience. The food was decent but very small portions. A burger fries and drink plus desert still left me hungry. Not to mention way over priced ! $5 for a soda. The burger was decent but nothin to rave about. There are too many burger places in Vegas that are much better and most cheaper. I wouldn't waste your time with umami burger.  I will say the ice cream sandwich was delicious though ! Even for $7

BsQ_KbxMt7mXHd-6JK7q5g.text: Love love love it! They have Unami burger in SF and it's yummy there too so since we are staying in the SLS hotel we had to come and try it and it was yummy here too. We loved it SOOO much we Came 2 days in a row for the sunny side burger!! Sooo good! The truffle fries where too much so we got the regular fries the second time. They give you 3 sauces they where delish. Also ordered a strawberry margarita and you can't taste the alcohol but it was still yummy. Very refreshing ..will probably eat here again before we leave

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sunny side burger

-xFu_8bcr5PuEreNlYe6sA.text: Always request Mandy. Best waitress on the strip. Friendly and professional. Definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Always request Mandy. Best waitress on the strip. Friendly and professional. Great place to watch a game. Definitely be back.

qclZAnF8ydiOYXrI2MXsQw.text: Mandy was absolutely amazing. She put up with me and my horribly awkward husband all night. She was a great!! The food was also amazing !!

ITmcj_5TFVEFXwae3-uU5g.text: Checked this place out for a quick bite to eat. Great burgers, and yummy truffle fries! Our server Liz was excellent! Highly recommend!

wy7zcxoIlZpy_8yjIQ1tKw.text: Truffle fries were tasty...easy to eat.  Manly burger was filling and the 4 beer custom sample topped the meal off.

RpsMBMBTqJNEGpVk8_e-Uw.text: We decided to have dinner at Umami while checking out the SLS. We were promptly greeted, and our server came to take drink orders within moments.  The service was really great. Friendly, attentive, but not smothering. Mandy had great suggestions for food and beer, and really made our experience fun and engaging, definitely ask for her.   As far as the food, generally excellent. The burgers are unctious and full of the namesake flavor sensation, which I'm not sure some reviewers get. Meat is ground in-house (which yields a much better texture than typical compacted rubbery ground beef). The fries are underhwelming. They'd do better to switch to a hearty steak fry, especially since "manly" is a recurring theme on the menu. Contrary to the fries, the onion rings are thick cut, not encased in heavy batter, and are among the best I've had.  Make sure you also have the Brooklyn Later, it's as winning as Nancy's service.

NQC8GTMNDndLwdVHu15Eig.text: A great sports bar. Lots of beer choices. The truffle cheese fries are great. We had the manly burger and that was delicious. Great selections of shots and bombs. I thought it was a bit pricey, but reasonable for Vegas. My husband loved it. He thought it should get 5 stars. The screens are amazing all around.

-icw7AgJE1pNREnAl6xB7A.text: AJ was absolutely incredibly! Come for the umami and stayed for the Pokemon go advice! She's great and the food is delicious!

n1BTxtyWN2znZOHwegg6_A.text: Great spot to grab a quick meal.  This was my first time to Umami.  I got the Ahi Tuna burger and truffle fries.  The fries were so good!  Also, this is your spot for a cheaper meal on the strip.  if you're a sports fan, they had a ton of TVs to watch whatever games were on at that time.  Service was good and the food came out fast.

buBDTeHEW5gkS9-n_UF4aQ.text: Safa is rocking behind the Patio Bar! Great food, awesome service with a smile, and the best place to watch football in Las Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Safa!

22jDoCDbTfNi4JDxujoUGA.text: Didn't have a chance to try any of their burgers but fell in love with their chicken fingers and their awesome jalapeno ranch sauce. Service was great and very fast.

drgKGmYyKE4BvkX561A2DQ.text: Landed this morning and just had the Manly Burgers. Amazing!  Get the Diablo sauce and mix with the house made ketchup!

Xj0-OYT4P-WCzl6Qpzr3Pw.text: My wife and I ate at UMAMI'S twice  and Angel was our server both times. The food was great but  the service was excellent. We are local, retired people and we will definitely come back again. The only thing ; I want Angel as my server. Thank you so much, Mr. & Mrs. Harris

iNqgvg3Wg7L-sLeSgqkmFA.text: I've eaten at the Umami Burger in Santa Monica, CA and the one in Pasadena, CA so my Husband and I were crazy excited to see that one was coming to Las Vegas right next door to us!! The truffle burger is AMAZING! So juicy and bursting with flavor. If you like tater tots, order the cheesy tater tots. They're not on the menu though, they're a secret... Shhhh. My hubby and I agree the jalepeno ranch sauce is best with the tots. The other sauces are just ok. I took a star away, because online it said they weren't taking reservations until September 1st. But when we walked into the dining area, after about a 40 minute wait, all of the booths were reserved. The waitress  was nice though!

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. On top, the Royale (has braised short rib on top of a truffle burger). On bottom, the classic and delicious truffle burger.
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cheesy tater tots from the secret menu... Get the jalepeno ranch sauce!!

yizEfTUK7h0nDPhVccatsQ.text: Great place to watch a game with their $2 draft Bud Light Beers and all the widescreen TV's. However, AVOID the chicken wings. They have two varieties, BBQ and spicy, both of which were not so great. Other than that, it was a good ambiance for watching any game.

-kLp4_lCjQ5MRbBMW-_P-g.text: Love Umami burger, and our server Jordan was incredible. Super cool, always came to ask if things were ok, how food was, and if we needed anything. Even though it was outside on the deck, he made sure to check glasses for beverages, ensure we have enough utensils and napkins and took care of the generally small details that making a dining experience memorable.  Not to mention he recommended a damn good burger.

uz7hxUApQoS-PPbLZQeG5w.text: This place was great. My girl and I are went in Got seated really quickly and our server Casey was awesome. Hands down the best server ever. Her service is amazing, helped me with all my questions about the menu, gave great recommendations, and made a very comfortable experience. The tall bald busser was also very nice too. Definitely recommend the throwback and cheesy tots.

2_V7HPb-A1PDh_S82Vsahg.text: I had the cali burger, it had a roasted tomato, Swiss cheese grilled onions special sauce butter lettuce and ground beef patty,  cooked medium. It was amazing! The service was excellent, we had to make a reservation for a club on NYE and only had 30 minutes to eat, we were served quickly and they brought our bill quickly, we were very pleased.

7WwAOuWVpA0Ic9DDrKaaMA.text: The food was GREAT. Tashja,my waitress was terrific.  Her suggest to make an already good meal great was on point.  My first visit to this establishment..A MUST WHEN IN VEGAS..

zgZtD9DZlg7ZeghgqCsArQ.text: I always stay at the SLS when traveling to Vegas. One of my favorite experiences is to stop in at Umami Burger. The staff are always attentive and welcoming. Amanda is usually behind the bar and provides a great guest experience. My suggestion for dining would be the namesake Umami burger and sweet potato fries. It never disappoints.

p2h93QjIUm-T5okGlwsEpA.text: Great selection of food at very reasonable prices.  I'm not a burger person so I got the Ahi Tuna lettuce wraps, loved them.  Everyone who got a burger enjoyed them and they were cooked to requested temp perfectly.  The only downer was the side sweet potato fries, was noted on the menu that they are cinnamon sugar fries, too sweet to eat with the burger and tuna.  They do have a nice selection of beer and craft cocktails.

nhP_T6vKea2PTYzh5-psZw.text: I got the umami burger and my wife the truffle burger. The truffle burger was bananas. Great service also thanks to Tashja!

P8Zz14WSavdraqw1Wh9Aow.text: SLS hotel in Vegas has the umami burger lounge and bar. It was a really nice decor. We were a party of 4 and had the Travelzoo deal for 4 burgers and drinks for $55. We walked in past the hostess because she was busy chatting with her colleagues. We didn't where to head out so we ended up coming back to the front and letting her know we need to be seated. The service was good but slow bec the server took our drinks, while it took sometime to bring those drinks. The food took sometime to get out of the kitchen. When it did, it was really good. In addition to the deal, we ordered their fries selection and they were awesome. Their umami. Tigers are really flavorful with a good quality and size. Their bun is pretty tasty too. I would get that again for sure and their truffle fries.

wsgnKMPGhR6y4HgUxuirLg.text: Great place to go on the strip! My boyfriend and I ordered several different items for us to split and it was well worth it. We were able to try so many good things from the menu. Service was very nice and even got to chat with the manager. LOVE LOVE LOVE

cXhNG_JQHNFLMzapBMquow.text: After checking out of our room and heading to the airport, we had lunch here. Not much of a selection, but the food was good. You receive a massive menu, of which, 1/8th is actually food and the rest, beers and drinks.  If you like different craft beer - may be a fun place to try. The food was good too. Burgers were cooked well and had good flavor. I don't care for ketchup or mustard on a burger and requested mayo, they have a garlic aioli instead, which was very good.  The truffle fries are good - but strong. Make sure you have some gum for after your meal. :) Our waitress was great and recommended the spicy sauce and house made ranch for the fries....both had a good flavor.  3 stars because while it was good, it wasn't memorable....not sure I would necessarily return if we found our way back to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QXab3K1ooruLj6ocXyTV2A.text: Aj is the best! Highly recommended! First time here and she advised what to try...everything was fantastic...ask for AJ if you come here!

1VLvn02Yd-b7I2SAKisrDw.text: Got the truffle burger & trifle fries, kind of small portions but it was delicious. Great customer service. Enjoyed the experience.

MJ1UVbdMwnZoa4qrFjPlZw.text: We were sat yesterday around 2:20.  The server came to ask for beverages.  We all ordered water with lemon as we really don't drink.  The disappointment on the servers face was evident because we didn't order alcohol.  My sister ordered coffee with cream and sugar.  No biggie we thought.  Drinks were delivered and food order was taken but no cream or sugar for the coffee or lemon for the water as requested.  I went to go ask an employee to send over a manager as we still didn't have cream or sugar after 10 minutes for the coffee.  Our server never came to the table to tell us there was an issue with the cream or sugar.  Apparently the manager had to go across the whole casino to retrieve cream and sugar (WTF???).  My sister didn't receive her cream or sugar until 2:35 with no explanation or apology from the server or management.  I had to get up from the table again to ask another employee for lemons as our server forgot!   Food was delivered in a very tacky way.  The food runner came to the table and auctioned off the Food.  Apparently Umami doesn't have position points so the runners don't know which guest gets which item.  So the runner stays in one position at the table and delivers the food expecting us to grab the plates instead of moving to the other side of the table and put the plate down.  Very tacky to stand in one area and attempt to deliver to 5 different people.  Most decent restaurants have the runners walk around the table and deliver to each customer.  I asked the runner for more napkins as we only had 1 each. The manager finally came around and wasn't really empathetic at all and didn't really seem to care that we received horrible service.  I told her that I am a local and work in the hospitality business.  I had to ask another employee again for napkins as they we're forgotten. The food was extremely average for vegas standards.  We were done eating and it took at least another 10 minutes for someone to come around, I asked for the bill.  The employees didn't start pre-budding the table until the bill was brought.  Normally pre-bussing is a given when everyone is obviously done and stacks empty plates on the table.  I guess Umami does it differently than every single restaurant I have worked in for 15 years on the strip.  By the way the manager never came back to ask about the food or say anything to us.  I felt bad about leaving a very crappy tip but we did receive the worst service I have ever had in Las Vegas.  I like the SLS but Umami sucks.  We were all extremely disappointed.

cokazKTaHy21xcWZfZzNnQ.text: Drove 17 miles is to eat here and it's closed on a Wednesday night at 6. What a fucking joke.

Hw_qU4DWnLo0yP0Jn6Zobw.text: Best  burger  ever. I can't  eat  other  burgers  now  cause  nothing  tastes as good  as  a fresh  ground  burger. Had  the  truffle  fries too which  were  good.

GqjTKToLxPIf6HVZ-TpbhA.text: I'm not much of a reviewer.  This is my first Yelp review, even though I use Yelp often. I travel every week and eat at the best places in many of the best cites in the US. Umami is a great spot to relax and get good burgers and watch sports. Prices are fair for Vegas and the staff was very attentive. Mandy, our server, made several sharp recommendations on our orders and they were all spot on. The food arrived warm and fresh and tasted very good. The big screens were very sharp/ had great resolution. I wish I was here on Sunday for the NFL.   Only other high burger in Vegas I've had Gordon Ramsay's BurgR and I'm a huge Gordon fan, but Umami makes better food at better prices and has a way better vibe and service.

ld6v95c2xAQ0e1fJ9a_GTg.text: Great Original burger. Such a great taste. Could come with fries or something. But it is a great burger. The bartender Christine was fantastic. Its not often you find an employee who champions their employers products. I didn't really even want the original burger. She sold me on it and it was fantastic. GREAT BURGER.

WA2zlMDq5b1U89MvAALC6Q.text: Horrible service. Word to the manager reading this... If you have a line of people wanting to eat at your establishment, seat them, that's how you make money. Or tell them you have full service at the bar to the left of you. Rant over.

SBPOmsguftt9uhnzzVKZCw.text: I had the pleasure of eating several items here. The umami burger and truffle fries were excellent, bursting with lots of flavor. The onion rings were okay - they were almost as huge as bagels! The fried pickles are amazing!

HU8SUXDxoMXVUwdC2vOmbw.text: Yummy! The food was delicious. The service is semi slow but very friendly servers. I recommend sitting outside.

GS8SjfpXpa5J7dLF2AP5kg.text: Best burger place ever!! Definitely recommend to anyone! Friendly staff, good food... Basically the whole package!!

6oWLy4tzmhO4zWeXWgogew.text: Others may like Umami - I just don't.  I like a tasty basic burger - and I think sometimes - the more stuff they are piling on top - it's to disguise the fact that the basic burger itself is not very good.  I ordered the Manly Burger, and I just didn't really like it.  I removed the bacon lardons cause they are just too thick for me to find appetizing.  The cheese is more of a cheese sauce, kind of runny and hardly any flavor.  And part of their thing is there is no lettuce or tomato or onion or pickles.  I'd rather eat at Smashburger or even 5 Guys for a tastier burger.  I did try the Sweet Potato fries, based on other reviews - and they were pretty good. Also, nice that you can get a beer - quite a large selection, and I think mixed drinks too.   Our server was friendly and the food didn't take that long to arrive.  But the atmosphere here is also lacking, in my opinion.  It's like eating in the middle of a noisy sports bar - with TVs everywhere you look.  And if that's what you want - then that is great.  And then, also, with the Strip location - you are gonna pay way more than at any normal spot.  2 burgers, 2 sides, 1 beer, 1 pepsi, + tip: $50.00.

DenqRAjCtenE-ozvrGma3g.text: Although the server is nice the service is HORRIBLE.  Lost or forgotten orders from both the kitchen and bar.  For how over priced it is I expect better service.

KuSBUncikIJKgrVF4qvnbg.text: Great atmosphere and vibe, attentive and helpful service from Mandy who provided on point recommendations for excellent appetizers, burgers, dessert at a reasonable price for a new establishment within a new fancy hotel at SLS.

TnUdpdwLu0iP2_iytW5mQQ.text: Delicious burgers!!! and u definitely need to try the cheesy tots!!! They are sooooo good. Service was good! And Mandy was really attentive to everything we needed. We will forsure be coming back.

LQQ1Aw_NSDQ5YJge8MFanA.text: This place is amazing! Out bartender, Melissa was cute, funny and extremely knowledgable. Not only were our burgers she recommended amazing, but she knew her beers too! The red IPA she suggested after I started with a Firestone IPA, was awesome.   It was a busy Sunday, and she was making drinks non-stop for all the waiters AND helping half the bar. I was really impressed by how flawlessly she handled it all. I'm used to bartenders in Vegas just wanting to up sell you and take your money, but here the staff is so friendly, and just seem interested in making sure you have a great time. Will definitely be coming back here for football on Sundays with Melissa!   Also, I've read some reviews about the burgers being too small? They are perfect sized, especially if you get a side of the amazing manly fries. They have so much flavor too! That's why most Americans are overweight, because they want to eat 3 serving sizes for 1 meal!

iQoNGyOMB_x3GU43P4lilQ.text: Decent, but didn't meet my expectations. The carmelized onions on my hamburger overwhelmed all of the other flavors(roasted tomato,parmesan crisp,and mushroom). Ketchup was good; on the sweet side.

JbPXif1EKSEFcGJRxiGOUg.text: Nice open atmosphere great for watching the games for the day. The cocktails I thought were really great. Very flavorful and creative. The truffle fries were nice so was the manly burger great flavor and plenty of bacon. My date had the truffle burger with the egg on it and she loved it. The ahi tuna burger could definitely have been better. The ahi tuna was flavorless and had an unnecessary amount of carrots on it. Service was decently quick and was actually extremely well priced. Would come back especially to watch the game on a Sunday.

rQOXkoVqsKbiZyRWe9F4eg.text: Meh. This place was okay. It didn't exactly blow my mind but I didn't hate it either. The server was very friendly and knowledgable of the menu. My burger was slightly over cooked. The sweet potato fries were my favorite part. Those we delicious.

v2wOa1S11XwvyaYF4Hu6pg.text: Truffle fries were salty, burger is not the easiest to eat. But Charlie is the man. So attentive even though it was busy and they were understaffed. Great customer service!

NeCzuTl8Avhaoh63w7O1hw.text: Coming from San Diego, I am a beer snob and they have a great selection. My waitress Lauren was quite attentive. The burgers are amazing and I recommend the sweet potato.

qNpj0F7ettWTufN6A34rFw.text: We stopped in for a snack. The thin fries were great. Only 4 stars though because their ranch was terrible and they don't have regular Heinz ketchup.

offcCsJsqJKGnl-EqBjw1w.text: Burgers are very good.  Excellent beer menu.  Service was quick and friendly.  Great place to watch sports and eat.

QcnbIWKxnE-SNEiT_F3mrA.text: Its a burger joint with the food and atmosphere you'd expect from a burger joint. The burgers do not include fries, which makes your meal pricier than you would expect. They do offer a veggie burger, which was okay but nothing special.

dvUYomqZkeLMS9TgwDshlQ.text: Best burger ever!!! Truffle fries are really good! Amazing service from waitress Tashja!

UhawSAT_T16tCIY7TBUoFw.text: Went here for a birthday lunch. Being vegan I was disappointed in the selection. They did not have a vegan or veggie patty, and to top it off, what they did have was a sloppy joe type or sandwich that was open. The menu stated "vegan mix" with lentils, tomatoes, and cheddar jalapenos and some other stuff. That's not vegan. Maybe the chef needs a refresher. Then I got my food it and it  had a creamy sauce on top, again, why does your "vegan choice" say vegan when there is dairy in it. I didn't want to complain because I was out on a birthday lunch, the environment was great. U can eat on the couch and watch sports, or sit at the bar. Service was ok. Fries don't come with your meal but burgers start at 12$!!! I found that crazy. Huge drink selection but nothing appealing. Maybe I'll consider going back once they update their "vegan" selection.

iUOQTkw56PySKbeNABZXpw.text: I think there is a umani burger in NYC but never been and actually did not eat a burger while here though did try out there beers, and salad.  My friends stated burger were good.    I did like the outdoor seating in their beer garden area as nice to get out of the casino and relax especially during the cooler months of the year.  I was a little annoyed they would not plug in my phone as needed to charge it up at a plug by game table which was in a section one could not sit in.    Does not open at 10am when games start which is surprising since sports book is within its confines.

6JIXsp66W2S9kfyLI_LuYQ.text: Wanted to try this new burger place at the SLS,  We walked in from the outside entrance. The hostess opened the gate for us never greeted us and told us we needed to go inside to the hostess stand to get a seat outside.  We walked through to find a hostess to seat us outside, we then waited for another waiter to take our drink orders.  I received my drink 10 mins. after I ordered it and then the other drink came 10 mins. after that.  They were out of the first choice, had no ginger soda on hand. Ordered the signature burger,  you can't specify how you want your burger cooked. Our waiter just said it's a thin burger and it comes the way it's cooked.  We were never given any napkins or utensils and had to grab them from another table...we were told not to do that.  lol.  They had all these workers walking around doing nothing!  We had to move from our picnic table because of a smoker.  they didn't want us to use our free fry coupon because we ordered truffle fries, scolded us again for that... upon leaving the hostess opened the gate and we were herded out with no goodbye or thank you again!  I was warned by a friend that spent the weekend at the SLS,about the place;  thought I'd try it anyway.  I guess they don't want any locals, this is not a feel good place u-mami?

vNg2KnCkHBn9QJc_k0UDxg.text: Fries were good but the portions are small. Slow service. Not worth the price. Stay on the other side of the strip and don't waste your time on this place.

T7fUmUdgU5X7y4i4XDUwYg.text: Terrible experience! This review is for the bar only. Came to the SLS on opening weekend. Went up to the bar that was facing the casino because there were too many people at the main bar. It wasn't too crowded but I stood there for a minute while the douchey bartender flirted with the girls sitting at the bar and poured them free shots. He took my drink order, told me one price then charged my card for a greater amount. When I questioned him he rudely stated "Well I guess I just told you the wrong price." After me expressing that this was not an acceptable answer he proceeded to say "what do you want me to do, give you your money back?" Then pulled a few dollars out of his wallet and threw them at me. Having been to the SLS in Beverly Hills, I was definitely not expecting this type of service. I really expected better and hope that they improve.

uRHafnONxkkQEsbDPM2O-A.text: Saw this place on DDD and did not know they had a spot in Vegas until I was using Yelp to find a place to eat.  3.5 stars for the food and 5 stars for the service.  I wish I could remember our servers name but he was very friendly and knew the menu/drink specials inside out.  Finally got to try the Umami burger and may give it another shot this fall.

uKj6IwDrWAUv7v-UfDePjQ.text: Our waitress forgot about us halfway through our meal, but when we brought it to the general manager's attention she comped us and genuinely expressed how sorry she was. I would definitely come back based upon my interaction with the GM, Rachel. I frequent the Umami in Los Feliz, and the burger here was just as good. It's always nice when a chain can stay consistent.

owzSnoTsZ55BfGOEkXgpXg.text: It was okay... Nothing to get excited about. I love a good burger but this was just lacking in flavor for the price. The tempura onion rings were spot on though!

KNGK_BzwfhRwwt257kdg5g.text: Awesome dining experience!  The food was great and the service was excellent. Megan L. was my server, and she was very friendly and attentive. She did a great job, and made the experience even better.

2QeJ89s3-r3ywESgpTBVnQ.text: My Unami burger was grilled to perfection! Slightly chard and not dry! All of their sauces are made in house. I suggest trying all of them. The tempura onion rings at Tasty!!! Try the ice cream cookie sandwich!! Not hard or frozen! I'll be back!!

jGqItKoY5M4Kj47eakHjxg.text: We are here later in the evening because we were staying at the SLS. There were nit many places open and we were kind of tired after a long drive. The food was mediocre! Nothing was terrible but nothing blew me away. The cocktail was very fake tasting and tasted like a diet juice. I probably wouldn't go back!

jsuK8a8FeKZHGv0KTkjxxA.text: The ahi tuna burger with a lettuce wrap was bomb! Good service, even prices, great place to grab lunch and a few drinks!

vEftI5wUtoUpKX4GtmhevQ.text: If I could give zero star, I would. Very unprofessional & unapologetic. Customer service was very unsatisfactory.   Came here for lunch with my daughter while waiting for hubby to finish playing on the table..thinking I'd give this place a try after having read some reviews about the bad service. I requested to be seated at a booth considering my daughter always, and by always, I mean literally always manage to fall off chairs. We were explain that since I had my daughter with me, it's automatic that they'll seat us by the back booth because of the sports book. We were shown the way & guess what! 2mins upon having sat, I was told we had to finish ordering, waiting & eating by 12:30pm. Mind you, it was literally 11:54am!  Just coz a party was coming at 12:30pm to occupy the space where we were seated -- WHY HAVE US SIT HERE WHEN YOU WERE GONNA USE THIS SPOT IN 36mins! I don't work in the restaurant business but I think courtesy is a universal thing wherever & whatever field of work you do. I asked for specifics but no answer provided. NO APOLOGY EXTENDED.   I had to LEAVE. I wished it would have been a better experience. Very disappointing. Sometimes it's not just the food that matters, QUALITY SERVICE means a lot to paying customers like me as well. You get more exposure by word of mouth especially if patrons get good service. Very disappointed.

pfvE8oc42LnPEZZ6E0m-fA.text: Nice beer garden with typical umami burger quality.  Nice scene, good for catching the game and a beer.  Courtney was a fine server too.

AHTxk2C_LaCKvl4nSVUXFg.text: This was my first time coming to Umami Burger and it will probably be my last. The food was okay, not that I would rave about. Prices are fine. But the service is absolutely horrendous!! It took at least 15 minutes for the bartender to acknowledge us. After he finally did, taking our drink order seemed like an inconvenience for him. Sitting here at the bar for an hour and haven't seen him smile once. He ran out of fireball while pouring a shot and filled it with some generic whiskey to top it off. When he finally came around to take our food order, we felt rushed and once again like we were inconveniencing him. When I food arrived, my burger was rare and I thought that it was strange that they didn't ask me how I wanted it cooked. When the bill came, I saw that he had taken the liberty to put in how I wanted my burger cooked without asking me.  This sounds like a lot of complaining on my part but I work in the industry. I'm not hard to please but the service here was terrible and I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone.

udvEA57Xu6c_0EC1r56_aQ.text: Unimpressed with their original burger and short rib style fries. The burger ju didn't tats that great. It was cooked nicely but the flavor just wasn't there. As for the fries, major letdown - soggy city. If it's gonna be soggy because of the gravy then the gravy should be decent

63iezMaC90ZPHRj_Zlif-g.text: Delicious and great atmosphere! I had the short rib burger and it was delicious! Mandy my server was awesome and really attentive! Will come back next time I'm in Vegas for sure!

OSviS7Ew1VcvfqhqnnGvPw.text: Amazing burgers,  Cheesy tots (not on the menu) are amazing We have eaten here twice on our vacation and that should speak highly as there are many amazing choices for food. Tried the Manly and Truffle burger and cleaned my plate both times. Our server, Casey, was awesome and provided quick service.  Will be back again

5EZMJUxtzbjA4m89Yt_qrw.text: 5 stars goes to Sunny!! Ask for him and he will make sure to go out of his way to provide the best experience ever!! Also we had another server who was phenomenal her name is Saida and we found out that she was getting trained by Sunny !!

Iiys0zT1aG8t-RH1caSHHw.text: I tried the burger when I went to LA awhile back. I liked it. Hell, I loved it. The service there was bomb and the food was pretty good. So, guess how excited I was when this spot opened awhile back?  Well, lemme tell you about this location. I finally tried the place after how long, but NOPE. I get comped rooms at the SLS and stay there when I can. We did try to go to the restaurant first, but the host didn't even pay attention to us, so we left. They do room service and all so we thought, why not? Let's eat and hang in the room. For some freakin reason, NO ONE answered! No one!! Hell, the operator was even lost to why they weren't answering. Took maybe 6x to finally get through to them but that's because the operator tried another extension. HORRIBLE.   When we finally got our order, which was disgusting and super oily, it was a mess. I feel like the person who delivered the food decided to swing the bag around hardcore and hit some random gambler on the way to my room with it.   We ordered:  Umami truffle - Decent at best. Simple expensive thing. $13 Manly burger - Regular...mediocre...a mess. $12 Truffle Especiale - The egg makes everything better. Like I said, everything looks like it got into an accident or shaken to death. $14 Smothered fries - This looked like puke and it was cold. I couldn't do it. $5? Truffle fries - I liked it. This was my fave thing. $5? Ice cream - Prepackaged, overpriced, CoolHaus ice cream. $7 per a small sandwich.  There was more, but these are the ones I tried.  BTW, they forgot our ice cream. Dude had to make a 2nd trip and he had attitude. Wow...   We ordered a lot, I get it... It also cost a lot. Cost over $100. Ugh... We should've just went to In'n'out or at least Bachi Burger.   This really upset me. I liked the place....but this location killed it. BAD.  Never again. Go to In'n'out or at least Bachi Burger for gourmet burgers instead.  Service - F- (Retrain the staff.) Price - D+  Food - D -  Ambiance - C   Overall: NO. Never again! 0 stars if I could. It's hard to wear my patience thin and this place definitely did.

CscW0UXKexz06CEAtkWVSg.text: I heard a lot of buzz around Umami this last year. Friends, yelp, and a whole slue of other people have told me how much their love their burgers. While I enjoy a good gormet burger, normally I find myself always going back to The Counter and calling it good because I have yet to find something to top that experience.   While Umami is indeed really good, I still do not think it takes the title of being top dog.   We were eating at the SLS and everyone wanted to try a new burger. We sat down in the heavy sports bar feel of umami because there are TV's absolutely everywhere just like a sports book. It took us a forever and a half to get served because of a mix up, but when we actually ordered everything was smooth sailing.   I shared a truffle burger and some sweet potato fries. I loved the truffle on the burger, the cheese, the patty being cooked just right, and the bun. It was just a little bit small for what I was paying I feel. I got the sweet potato fries because my girlfriend really wanted them. Normally I hate sweet potato fries, but these were not like other's I have had before because they had cinnamon sugar sprinkled on them. This must have been magic pixie dust because it made them go from something I do not enjoy to a plate of fried potatoes that I wish I was no longer splitting with someone else.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

gRUMrssjtfpabdbwnNQkHA.text: 5 star for the service and 2 star for the food. I ordered the truffle burger substitute turkey patty and it was TERRIBLE. The patty tasted like it was microwaved and 0 flavor. The truffle fries and Tots were okay.   We are regulars at SLS however would not be a returning customer to this place.

C7xIju10ZHlTR73GMLYLjQ.text: Came here for the impossible burger but was really disappointed. First the restaurant was in a weird location which in the same spot as the sports book. Hard to find and the host was no where to be found. This wasn't that big of a deal but it was just weird. When we were seated the waitress we're wearing t shirts advertising the impossible burger but no one explained to us what it was and there wasn't any information about it anywhere. It also came with regular cheese not vegan cheese. This could all be overlooked but the $16 double impossible burger came out and my first thought was I thought it would be bigger. The burger was good but I was not even close to full and was really disappointed with everything but the taste.

SVmCgK4NLsik1jHDFZurkw.text: First bite. WOW!  Shitake mushroom, sun-dried tomato, and baked crispy Parmesan wafer.  My wife ordered this well done and I'm a medium burger guy.  This is a solid burger that doesn't fall apart. We agree this was possibly the all time best burger ever eaten. This is a lively (loud) sports bar.  Great place to hang to watch a game.  Take the Deuce or SDX bus from the strip to near the stratosphere.  SLS hotel is a Very nice Starwood property and casino. Very up to date!

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. First bite. WOW!
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Double 14&#39; screens

pikZkSDyibx1LLzJd8JgmA.text: Came here with a group of friends yesterday. They were visiting from out of state and wanted know where they could find, "the best burger in town."   ...Their minds were blown...

SQjw6mKdpXYgP45_wq8ByQ.text: Service was slow and it was pretty early in the day. We split our check but the waitress wasn't good at math and over charged us. They were nice but nothing to go back for

nS3cattN7GKw53drs0Sd_g.text: Dry. Not to order. Awful experience. They will comp your drink if you play their video poker.  But $20 dry nasty burger is awful.  I hope I'm wrong, but avoid this place!!

n9I212k2jJoCTycr-Lx3cg.text: To start off, SLS is amazing. Friendly people, great vibes and overall just a beautiful hotel. Among all the restaurants this place has, Umami has to be my favorite! Amazing well cooked burgers that make your mouth water and the fries are so crispy and tender it's just too dam good. Highly recommend this place!

F7iv8Qif9JJW8OAB9vvemw.text: They've got a decent menu - the manly burger is delicious. Its a must try if you happen to visit SLS, a little ways away but comparable to Gordon Ramsay's Burger in Planet hollywood

m76lmHnwMZk1GDaY9GTfvQ.text: SLS hotel's grand opening was today and while there were many restaurants to eventually try, a gourmet burger was what my mind and stomach were set on.   The wait for a table was a good 30 min. but this gave us some time to explore the casino.  The friendly staff took our info and we received a text message when our table was ready.  When we arrived, we had the option of indoor and outdoor seating.  We stayed cool inside.   The atmosphere is loud.  Half the room caters to the sports book where you can order food while catching multiple games on large plasma tvs or sit at the bar and have one of their specialty cocktails.  The music rolls in from the casino so you won't be making much conversation though without raising your voice.   Our server was very nice and accommodating, explaining the menu and the sauces, and making suggestions for us.  We opted to start with some fries as an appetizer which you can customize.  We had gravy and braised short rib on top.  Delicious.    We ordered the original umami burger and the truffle especiale. Descriptions on my photos, my wife and I decided the truffle burger was the better of the two.   Other non-beef options like ahi tuna and the green turkey burger will have me coming a second time at least to try those.   The one hiccup was that my wife had her burger (the original) ordered well, while I like some pink and ordered mine medium. The order came out switched so I had to give up a majority of my yummy truffle burger to her!  We were just too hungry to send it back! :)  Anyways, solid burgers and fries. 4 stars!  Will be back.

Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Truffle especiale, fried egg, truffle butter, truffles arugula
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Smothered fries, braised short rib w/ house gravy

Meg3SBp9-MFIdOgWppSTGQ.text: (3.75) Good Overall.  Note: It's in the SLS Hotel  MENU: ** Grapefruit Cider = (4) very refreshing ** Water(tap) = (4) very good...must be filtered ** Simple French Fries = (4) very good * Umami Caesar Salad = (3.75) Good * Umami Burger = (3.5) good, but it was a little too sweet for me, and needed more salt. * Chocolate Chunk Cookie = (3.25) pretty good, but I prefer softer cookies, versus hard & crunchy.

PlgfxS2oPXQLmfciu6AQQQ.text: Sports Bar where the waitress couldn't find ESPN 2, didn't know which channel ESPN 2 was on, didn't want to ask anyone and got annoyed at me for wanting the TV at table. Hanged to something I specifically came in to watch.  And the same place where the waitress ignored me after my food was delivered until twenty minutes after my food was finished.

hbBtz1yIWB3GvybFLf5ArQ.text: AJ took care of us!!  Food is amazing. The impossible burger is possible!! It was fantastic. Definitely coming back.

PCs0lHVTwh5uz1VndDam9w.text: Awful service. Placed an order over the phone and was told it would take 5 min. Went down there and no one knew of any orders that were placed. I had to reorder my ONE order of truffle fries and specifically requested that the sauce be placed on the side so that they would not get soggy. I waited and waited and waited and thirty minutes later after speaking to two workers to follow up on the status of my fries, they come back w my fries. I walk all the way back to my room, starving, and notice my soggy fries swimming in sauce. Exactly how I did NOT want them. Extremely annoyed, disappointed, disgusted and really hating this place right now.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Disgusting soggy fries drenched in sauce that took nearly 45 minutes to get

G71sFEsFwBpdTi5YaQbUaw.text: They made this to do the impossible.  But, We came here to eat the impossible.  These plant based patties are definitely worthy of the buzz.  On top of a great burger our server Casey was a phenomenal and a joy.  Will come back again for this.

jsvKruEwvaFvvUmxVIXpTQ.text: Stayed at this hotel and decided to have a casual meal.  The highlight of my meal was the loaded Manly fries.   Complet decadence.  Ordered the standard burger and it was pretty good.  Undercooked, but interesting flavors with the Parmesan crisp and roasted tomato.  Didn't get much out of the Umami ketchup besides it being ketchup.   The big disappointment was it's part of a Beer Garden.   The menu was 1/5 food and 4/5 beers , wines and cocktails. Of the three ciders they had listed NONE were available.    Waitress's poor  excuse was "its the end of the month ".   Uh, you're a beer garden AND it was only the 24th of the month.   Not exactly END of month     She got frustrated and just blurted out that she wasn't responsible for the ordering.   Bad answer.

cDWwTEDqTMQmMERUXRZM1A.text: I came to SLS during March Madness to watched all the games and place bets at the sports book. I was lucky enough to come during one of the Umami Beer Tap takeovers. They featured (four Peaks) the Kilt lifter was my favorite. Staff was very knowledge when it came to beer. Food was also great.. I find myself coming in every other week for some good brew and a Manly burger. Umami is Definitely doing it Right!!

PPucBSDmgdZVzuJO_g88bA.text: So they have a very limited menu. A few apps and 7 burgers. That's it.  They're beer menu is varied but not deep. This is not for the beer snob - more for the novice beer snob.  I had their Caesars salad. It was not fishy. Which is one of my criteria - few anchovies. However, it was bland to an extreme. There was nice lettuce, a few croutons, and those expensive hatch cheese crisps. And some white dressing that was undetectable. It was like 10 bucks. For lettuce.  My server was great. Very nice and helpful.  The outside patio was almost fun to be at. The concept was there - the execution was not.  Cheap regular wood patio tables. Next to the noisy strip/Sahara intersection.  I'm very happy with the movement to strip side bars, but what's to see here?  The enormous intersection?  Three bus stops?  Not my thing.

Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wood patio benches.

AQSqyn3QEv49rBO56VopmA.text: This one was located inside SLS hotel, which is just off The Strip. Staff were really friendly and helpful. The food was better than okay, but not really what I was expecting. We shared the Umami burger and the Truffle Burger, which was my favorite. We also had truffle fries.  The waiter was so nice! He didn't look weird at us for asking for mayonnaise.  We sat outside, but the music was so loud that we could barely hear each other speak.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Umami burger on the top, truffle fries, and truffle burger on the bottom

ObOEMq5k45i0EDRogtEalw.text: As I was walking through the SLS admiring the beauty that this hotel/casino offers decided to stop in here for a drink. This is my first chance enjoying this bar and restaurant. The smells that are coming from the kitchen are amazing! They are also making me hungry. Originally I was only staying for a short while but the servers keep passing the bar with all these lovely treats.   I enjoyed my drink at the bar and I ordered a rum and coke. The bartender was even sweet enough to add a cherry to it too! The staff here are very friendly and pleasant. They provide such great service and have positive attitudes too. There is a lot of team work between the server and the bartender. A team that gets along provides a better atmosphere for all.   After another look at the menu I fell in love with the maple bacon fries. Who does not love bacon and now with fries. These fries were amazing and it is best to smother them in ranch dressing too! The serving of fries is so large that I could not even eat them all. The menu here for little treats is fantastic and a must try!

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Rum and Coke

7WpCIvVj4qA_UFtYdvwUlQ.text: My friend Kamala had read all about Umami  in a magazine article. I love non-meat burgers so, I really wanted to try it as well.  We were a party of 4 when we came here for a late lunch.    We were seated right away. In a nice large booth.  The restaurant was nice and cool inside ,which is another plus.   Our server did come quickly to get us all something to drink while we looked at the menu.  However, after we got our food. We really never saw our server again until we got the check.  We never got refills on our drinks and we had to ask another girl passing by for a to go box.    Other than the service issue, we had a good experience. Enclosed is a photo of the menu. There's many different types of burgers to choose from. Yes, they are very expensive.  However, you are in Las Vegas, in a hotel restaurant. So that is the Norm.   Kamala and I both ordered the Umami  burger.  It's a vegetarian burger. It has a lot of bread with it, I found it to be really good and had cheese and lettuce on it. I thought it was great. I will order it anytime .  Our other two friends both ordered regular burgers. They both loved them. The fries and salad are extra, a la carte.  We ordered regular fries and sweet potato fries. There was more than we could finish, so that is a good value as well .  The food is good, worth a try.  It's located inside the SLS Hotel.

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. An abundance of Fries
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Umami burger, delicious
Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The menu here at Umami

9t-rbBf0qgU9iRYvW0DTOw.text: Pretty cool place if you want to watch sports and place sports bets. They have the William Hill sports book in the restaurant. I had the Nashville chicken sandwich it was pretty tasty nothing really special or big "wow" factor. My wife had the throwback burger she said it was ok again just s regular burger nothing special. We tried the mushroom fries they were interesting probably wouldn't get them again at $12 price point. We are staying at this hotel so we will probably give them another shot for lunch. Wouldn't come here to go to this restaurant but if staying at the hotel it's a convenient choice.

1stFxIKdXBC-QSwRnpeBng.text: Good burgers, very casual. Eat here if you stay at SLS. Service terribly slow though.

TDWcj6ICaS0DCaqH6H73og.text: I've been wanting to eat at an Umami location for years and man was I happy. There were 4 of us and we each got a different meal and it all tasted delicious. I ordered the burger with the fried egg at rare. So good! It was so juicy and full of flavor and the temperature was perfect. We also ordered their calamari, it was so thick and in slices not rings. We were so surprised to how good the meat was. I thought it was gonna be chewy since it's so thick but it was delicious. I highly recommend this place.

f6cEIY3pt9OwroZGWflgvA.text: Tried to eat here on the first evening of our 10 day stay at the SLS. The interior seating area was empty and we wanted to sit outside where while it was hot out, they kept cool and comfortable with fans and water mists. There was no one behind the bar so we went back in to ask for a server and were told that they didn't have anyone working the space in spite of the number of people sitting there. We asked if the could make an accommodation and they wouldn't. We were told we could place a to go order, wait inside for it and then bring it outside.  If the restaurant had been even remotely busy I wouldn't write or post this but it was truly dead. We left.

tw-y7y3K4n1WPAzDHJ4-jw.text: Hmmm lets see here...paid $16 for a manly burger. Scarfed it down in about 2 minutes. It was a glorified big mac. I was still STARVING. So I ordered 12 piece buffalo wings. They were ok. This Umami burger joint is is located in the SLS Hotel casino. The casino is crackin, the vibe is cool..waiting on the Pacquiao-Thurmond fight..

SdiFnDS0lsQaHj5w43toJw.text: Had the Truffle burger and sweet potato fries, BOTH were delicious! And excellent service by Casey!

0RUIqk_Z4-Ao12bYnWW55A.text: Surprisingly very good... My wife ordered the meatless burger and she's still talking about it. We shared the thin cut fries and that was perfect for 2. I had burger that featured a very thick cut of bacon that was excellent

photos.caption: Photo of Umami Burger -  SLS Las Vegas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Checker board ceiling.

FOOf_mdXkw9UEY-Hmmawqw.text: We had a very negative experience here and I cannot honestly comment on the food. At 2 pm on a Friday, when the plane was not at all busy, we had terrible serine. Wrong food, disinterested server, and a very long wait to order and get our checks. We will not return. Manager came and brought us our checks finally, and did nothing. Offered us a "sampler" if we came back the next day. No thank you.

RsHQfE16gfzn5WV1whVIoQ.text: A great sports bar located on the northern side of the Las Vegas strip. This place was 10 minutes walk from our airbnb and we decided to go there. They have great collections of alcohols starting from beer to hard liquors and cocktails. I tried the manly burger and it was delicious. It had beef patty, bacon bits, bacon lard and umami sauce. Overall a great experience.

9OdxotqkXuENXP5CK0M1pQ.text: Thought we would eat before the Bill Bellamy comedy show at the Foundry. My party of 4, we were seated, waitress took drink order..the End.   In comes a party of over 25..Next thing I know, she takes the big party drink order. Asked waitress about our drink order, she tells us, " I have to take THEIR ORDER..not nice!  We got up and left.  I went back to talk to someone.  Did I mention that the party of 25 "ALREADY" had heir drinks!!! Tony the Manager wanted to know if we wanted  to come back ....AFTER THE SHOW at the Foundry.  UMMMMMM, NO!   I'm not coming back.
